title: Personal Wallet App
description: All your finances bundled together in 1 app. With this app you can take care of your finances effortlessly. Log your accounts every day to get a better insight in what you're worth at any point in time.

title: Product Database Quote Engine
description: An app that will allow you to quote your products to clients and send them a beautifully designed email in a couple clicks.

title: Google Maps App
description: A fully customizable google maps application that will take care of your maps for you. Fill it in your way and make it look beautiful.
